title: Drawing, "Project for ciboria", 1920–25
medium: Pencil, light blue watercolor, white heigtening, creamy paper
description: In Gothic shape. Three diamonds in three intertwined circles at the foot, another on the knob; on the box: [P resting on the top left stroke of  X]. Conical cover topped by a cross. Signature as A. Bordering line as -20.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for ciboria", 1920–25.Pencil, light blue watercolor, white heigtening, creamy paper. 1939-84-45-c.
